lifestyle_modifications.recommendation: Adopt a balanced diet low in refined sugars, processed foods, saturated and trans fats. Increase intake of whole grains, lean proteins, fruits, and vegetables. Focus on portion control.
Engage in at least 150 minutes of moderate-intensity aerobic exercise per week (e.g., brisk walking, cycling) and incorporate strength training 2-3 times a week.
Work towards achieving and maintaining a healthy body weight, as this significantly impacts blood sugar and cholesterol levels.
Avoid smoking and limit alcohol consumption. Practice stress management techniques (e.g., meditation, yoga).
